mapper.select:
SELECT igo_order_sn, receiver_Name, receiver_mobile, receiver_area, receiver_area_info, igo_total_integral, igo_trans_fee, add_time, goods_info, IFNULL(igo_msg,'未填写') igo_msg FROM `shop_integral_goods_order` WHERE `delete_status` =0 AND `igo_status` =20
AND DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and `igo_status` =#{status}
ORDER BY `add_time` desc
SELECT * FROM shop_integral_goods_order WHERE igo_status = 0 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, add_time, NOW()) >= 259200
